item.title: Where in the Dreaming City is Archie in Destiny 2? | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Bungie This good boy went to the Dreaming City Archie returns to Destiny 2 with a trip to the Dreaming City following the May 21, 2024, weekly reset. This is the latest in a series of ‚ÄúWhere ...
item.content:encoded: Image: Bungie This good boy went to the Dreaming City Archie returns to Destiny 2 with a trip to the Dreaming City following the May 21, 2024, weekly reset. This is the latest in a series of ‚ÄúWhere in the System is Archie‚Äù quests in the wake of the Into the Light update ‚Äî which are being staggered out week-by-week in the lead up to The Final Shape. Note this quest expires on the May 28 weekly reset, and will be replaced by another Archie quest in a new location. Remember, provided you complete...

item.content:encoded: Image: Ubisoft ‚ÄòWe are all focused on the matchmaking issue and are continuously investigating‚Äô People dipping into Ubisoft‚Äôs free-to-play arena shooter XDefiant are unable to access matchmaking due to connectivity issues, Ubisoft confirmed Tuesday. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre aware that some players are unable to join a game ‚Äî please bear with us while we look into servers and matchmaking,‚Äù a representative posted from the official X account. Players are reporting that they‚Äôre endlessly stuck searching for other ...

item.title: Bungie‚Äôs Destiny 2 cheating lawsuit will be decided by jury trial this week | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Destiny 2 | Image: Bungie/Sony Interactive Entertainment The dispute with AimJunkies has been ongoing for years The jury trial between Destiny 2 developer Bungie and cheating software creator and di...
item.content:encoded: Destiny 2 | Image: Bungie/Sony Interactive Entertainment The dispute with AimJunkies has been ongoing for years The jury trial between Destiny 2 developer Bungie and cheating software creator and distributor AimJunkies began Monday, nearly three years after the lawsuit was filed by Bungie lead attorney Jacob Dini in a Seattle court. It‚Äôs been a long, complicated journey to this point: AimJunkies, owned by Phoenix Digital Group, countersued Bungie in 2022 claiming the Sony-owned company illegal...

item.content:encoded: Image: Thomas Happ Games Add Axiom Verge 1 & 2, Cookie Cutter, and four other awesome side-scrollers to your Steam Deck library Characterized by their non-linear design, labyrinthine maps, and challenging bosses, the side-scrolling Metroidvania seems perfectly tailored for handhelds like the Steam Deck. Right now, you can add seven standout titles from the Metroidvania genre to your handheld library for just $14 from Humble, including some of our personal favorites. The highlights of the sev...

item.content:encoded: Image: Redemption Road/Tiny Build Battlefield meets Total War and chaos ensues As the first Kingmakers gameplay trailer illustrated, an army of heavily armored medieval soldiers is no match for a man from the future armed with a shotgun, grenade launcher, and sniper rifle. The matchup becomes even more lopsided when you can call in an attack helicopter to strafe an entire battalion into red mist. A new trailer for Kingmakers answers an equally important question of who would win: a huge mediev...

item.content:encoded: Image: Bungie Guardians finally have a foothold in The Pale Heart of The Traveler Destiny 2: The Final Shape is less than a month away, and Bungie has officially set the stage with its latest cinematic. item.title: We ranked all of League of Legends‚Äô cool swords for Cool Sword Day | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Riot Games Which is your favorite? The cast of League of Legends is so vast that the best way to find a character of interest is to just scan the roster of champions, looking for a distinctiv...
item.content:encoded: Image: Riot Games Which is your favorite? The cast of League of Legends is so vast that the best way to find a character of interest is to just scan the roster of champions, looking for a distinctive feature. One easy archetype for gamers to understand is someone with a cool sword; that makes sense, because ‚Äúcool sword‚Äù is basically on the bottom pyramid of Maslow‚Äôs Hierarchy of Needs. There are fifteen champions who wield swords; we excluded characters who just use very big daggers. We also d...

item.description: Image: Epic Games/Lego Group Another game came out today Fortnite continues its growth into a platform for experiences beyond the battle royale shooter, and now its adding another Lego game to its ro...
item.content:encoded: Image: Epic Games/Lego Group Another game came out today Fortnite continues its growth into a platform for experiences beyond the battle royale shooter, and now its adding another Lego game to its roster. Could it start to become the default home for Lego game experiences? On Tuesday, Lego Group and Epic Games released another game to its growing library of games: a space exploration adventure called Lego Smoothie Odyssey. Lego Smoothie Odyssey‚Äôs name perfectly describes its gameplay. You explo...

item.title: Why I still hold onto my Phantom Blade in World of Warcraft | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Blizzard Entertainment via Polygon A sword so cool you can see through it The coolest sword I ever obtained in a video game is the Phantom Blade in World of Warcraft. In fact, it‚Äôs so cool to...
item.content:encoded: Image: Blizzard Entertainment via Polygon A sword so cool you can see through it The coolest sword I ever obtained in a video game is the Phantom Blade in World of Warcraft. In fact, it‚Äôs so cool to me that I never parted with it. It‚Äôs still sitting in my original character‚Äôs bank vault, some 19 years after I first got it ‚Äî even though its stats have been squished almost to nothing by the multiple math resets the venerable online game has had over the years, and even though that character has ...
